about_the_game:
More information soon.

Step into the world at the edge of the Age of Woes, where humans, after a grueling war, take control of the lands of Remoria. Seize command of a fortress, engage in thrilling monster hunts, and then train these captured beasts to battle each other to the death in special arenas and deadly competitions.

Remoria is a dark and treacherous continent, ravaged by the scars of the prolonged conflict. As a player, you have the chance to claim dominion over a fortress, making strategic choices to expand your influence and dominion.

The realm of Remoria is far from tranquil. Sinister and grotesque monsters roam the untamed wilderness, lurking as constant threats to human settlements. As a fortress leader, your duty will be to track down these fearsome creatures, confronting them in ferocious battles, and capturing them alive for a darker purpose.

But the challenges don't end there. Once these monsters are captured, you can choose to train and mold them into powerful champions. They will become your deadly weapons, unleashed in fierce combat against each other in brutal gladiatorial spectacles and life-and-death tournaments.

Moreover, Remoria is a land teeming with ambitious leaders, all hungry for control and supremacy. While you strengthen your position and fortress, prepare for confrontations with rival lords who seek to snatch your power. Demonstrate your strength and strategic prowess as you engage in heart-pounding clashes.

More information soon.
